forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 16C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High around 60F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low near 10C. SSW winds at 30 to 50 km/h, decreasing to 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thunderstorms. Low 44F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Low near 45F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 64F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Low clouds and fog. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
